title: Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'Subscribe' button redirects the user to the subscription page.
steps: Locate the 'Subscribe' button on the top navigation bar.
Click the 'Subscribe' button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the subscription page.

title: Discord Link Functionality
description: Check if clicking the 'Discord' button opens the Discord community page in a new tab.
steps: Locate the 'Discord' button on the top navigation bar.
Click the 'Discord' button.
expected_result: The Discord community page opens in a new browser tab.

title: Archive Button Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Archive' button takes the user to the archive page.
steps: Locate the 'Archive' button on the top navigation bar.
Click the 'Archive' button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the archive page.

title: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Verify that clicking the 'Light' button toggles the theme to dark mode.
steps: Locate the 'Light' button on the top navigation bar.
Click the 'Light' button.
expected_result: The webpage theme changes to dark mode.

title: Search Functionality
description: Test the search functionality by entering a query and checking the results.
steps: Locate the search bar with placeholder text 'Search articles...'.
Enter a search query, e.g., 'AI'.
Press Enter or click the search icon.
expected_result: The search results page displays articles related to the query 'AI'.

title: Article Link Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Original Article' link opens the article in a new tab.
steps: Locate the 'Original Article' link in the article summary section.
Click the 'Original Article' link.
expected_result: The original article opens in a new browser tab.

title: Audio Playback Functionality
description: Check if clicking the 'Audio' button plays the article's audio version.
steps: Locate the 'Audio' button in the article summary section.
Click the 'Audio' button.
expected_result: The audio version of the article starts playing.

title: NotebookLM Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'NotebookLM' button opens the notebook feature.
steps: Locate the 'NotebookLM' button in the article summary section.
Click the 'NotebookLM' button.
expected_result: The notebook feature opens, allowing users to take notes.

title: Share Button Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the share button provides sharing options for the article.
steps: Locate the share button (icon with an arrow) in the article section.
Click the share button.
expected_result: Sharing options (e.g., social media, email) are displayed.

title: Content Accuracy and Consistency
description: Check the accuracy and consistency of the displayed article content and metadata.
steps: Read the article title, summary, and discussion highlights.
Verify the publication date and time against known data sources.
expected_result: The article content is accurate, and metadata is consistent with known data.

title: Visual Layout and Responsiveness
description: Test the webpage's visual layout and responsiveness across different screen sizes.
steps: Open the webpage on a desktop browser.
Resize the browser window to simulate different screen sizes (e.g., tablet, mobile).
Observe the layout and elements' alignment.
expected_result: The webpage layout adjusts correctly, maintaining usability and visual appeal across different screen sizes.
